title: Warhammers
content:
pon: This weapon will return to its owner when thrown.Dwarven Thrower: A dwarf throwing this warhammer deals an extra 1d8 Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large, Huge, or Gargantuan creature, the strike deals an additional 2d8 Bludgeoning damage. BackbreakerConcussive SmashWeakening Strike Orphic Hammer 1d10 (1d8) +3 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +3 Spell Resistance: You have Advantage on Saving Throws against spells. Unshackling Strike BackbreakerConcussive SmashWeakening Strike

Special
